snippet: Leaders of the United We Dream network said Wednesday that it would press for a seven-year pathway to citizenship for all 11 million illegal immigrants in the country.
abstract: United We Dream, national organization of young immigrants, says it will press for seven-year pathway to citizenship for all 11 million illegal immigrants in country; says it will not support measures that only offer citizenship to young people brought to United States as children.
lead_paragraph: Leaders of the United We Dream network said Wednesday that it would press for a seven-year pathway to citizenship for all 11 million illegal immigrants in the country.

headline.main: Group of Young Immigrants Seeks a Direct Path to Citizenship for All, Regardless of Age
headline.print_headline: Group of Young Immigrants Seeks a Direct Path to Citizenship for All, Regardless of Age
